column5: I'm not a Bruins fan but this is a great series of commercials.  Here are a few of them put together in a compilation.  Someone should let the Bruins know though, that the song at the end is by a good ole Canadian Boy ....  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LYDaZIYGSlY
They needed a Canajun to write a proper theme song
And we managed to dent the Stanley Cup too!
"but she's so pretty"  And the robot bear. I love it
Buffalo retaliates:  <iframe width="420" height="345" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/M2eZPGr5stk" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
go bruins don't mess with the bear
